items.sentence: In late summer and autumn one can see the leaves change colour.

If you can see your breath when you exhale, you know it's cold.
Sometimes the first symptom of cardiovascular disease is death.
Tom came out of his bedroom wearing pajamas and fuzzy slippers.
Sewing a button on a shirt is something you should learn to do.
There is no telling when a severe earthquake will strike Tokyo.
My family came to live in Tokyo in my great-grandfather's time.
Tom is hoping he can persuade Mary to go to the dance with him.
Tom is married to a woman who's three years younger than he is.
